briefTitle: Phase I Study of EOC202 Plus Paclitaxel in Chinese Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of hLAG-3 Fusion Protein, EOC202 (Eftilagimod Alpha) Combined With Paclitaxel in Chinese Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
